name: Bathroom renovation
description: Full gut, new fixtures, basic-mid finishes

name: Basement finishing
description: Framing, insulation, drywall, flooring, basic bathroom rough-in

name: Main floor renovation
description: Non-structural, flooring, paint, basic kitchen refresh

name: Full house renovation
description: Full interior renovation including main floor + basement
notes: Includes flooring, drywall, paint, lighting, kitchen & 1–2 bathrooms (standard finishes). Assumes no major layout changes; excludes structural beams, moving load-bearing walls, additions.

name: Addition / extension
description: One-storey addition over existing or at-grade
